inclusion.criterion: Affected with ataxia evidenced by mini International Cooperative Ataxia Rating Scale (Mini-ICARS) score >0 at baseline
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatic impairment defined as AST/ALT >5x ULN in the last 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Renal impairment defined as serum creatinine: > 0.5 mg/dL (<6 years); > 0.7 mg/dL (7-10 years); > 1.24 mg/dL (> 11 years)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of treatment with experimental drug within 28 days of Visit 1
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
